rationale: The segment contains no intensifiers or comparative adjectives modifying risk-adjectives.
The segment describes cases using neutral language.
No moderate verb paired with explicit scale/impact.
The segment describes the nature of the cases but contains no loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports absence of classic infection but lacks explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
Contains the bare negation 'Neither of these two cases... has been an actual influenza infection' without explicit calming.
